data.message: How about that dislike button? Can we finally get that?

replies.message: Thanks for the suggestion, Anthony. We're listening to all of the feedback we get from the Facebook community. If you have anymore suggestions, please let us know at: http://on.fb.me/1bc3BDo. -Chantal
It would  be a something  that  were  definitely  need, great  idea  Anthony.
how do I change my language back to English?
How do I change my language back to English? You all apparently think I'm Arabic!
Please tell me how to become an English speaking person again. You all have made me arabic. Please help.

Unsure why you are asking this in the replies to my comment try asking this in your own comment where it says write a comment... but I am fairly sure there is a  Language setting somewhere in the settings....
I would love a "don't like" button to display for animal hunting photos that come my way----and maybe FB will count those up in order to eliminate such photos.
Wouldn't be a half bad idea if FB  did that, implemented a tally like system that if it reaches so many dislikes it gets  removed from the site..

Dislike needed to happen yesterday. People need to realize that some of the ignorant horrible crap they post isn't actually that popular but they get 4 likes and think EVERYONE must agree with there drivel so they keep posting more. At least with a dislike button the clueless will start to realize that maybe...just maybe...everyone doesn't actually agree with them and they might actually be wrong about some things.

I hate having to hit 'like' (in order to keep receiving a page's posts, and to get it seen by more people) on things like animal/child abuse, sick/injured kids/pets, loss of a loved one, etc. I wish that there was a dislike button for situations such as those
